extendedInfo.description: Bring Ring (for Google Voice) allows you to quickly update which of your phones will ring.Designed with security and efficiency in mind:- Supports Google 2-step authentication- Does not store any username or password information- Efficient design for low memory and battery usageSimple, easy, and best of all: Quick!

reviews.title: Fast and elegant
reviews.comment: The developer has Nader some great changes to this app over the last several months - it\'s faster and snapper, much better than bookmaking the GV settings page. A joy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: pretty good, but authentication is annoying
reviews.comment: I\'d give this 5 stars if I didn\'t have to re-log in every week or so.. I know, minor annoyance except it seems to happen about every time I need to use the app.   Other than that, works very fast and does exactly what I need!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Essential App!
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand the previous reviews.. the app works.. simple UI.. now I have full control over my google voice forwarding numbers.. :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: but I could bookmark the GV settings page and do the same. If it has additional features like Voice Plus or Voice Choice, then I\'d keep this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does what is says
reviews.comment: Turns numbers on and off simply.  I do agree that it asks for a login far too much.  That wastes some of the time you save by using the app.  Also, reviews below state that some numbers aren\'t showing up.  I had that problem and I\'ve found that Bring Ring seems to choke on GV on numbers that are labeled with non alphanumeric characters.  Try changing the labels of the phone numbers to letters only (if they aren\'t already).  I do recommend it though.  I don\'t know of another app that performs the same function.
reviews.author: James Watkins

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome. Looks and works way better. Worth getting!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using it for about a year and I love it. Simple and does what it says it does.
reviews.author: Matthew Duncan

reviews.title: Good idea, needs work.
reviews.comment: Needed app, however I have five forwarding lines yet only three show up in the app, and they are mislabeled. Also needs a widget.
reviews.author: Jason Yates

reviews.comment: works great
reviews.author: Seth Loft

reviews.title: Bring ring
reviews.comment: What the heck. This dose even less than the free Google voice app.
reviews.author: Jesse smith

reviews.comment: crashes immediately after successful sign in with 2step verif.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Good Start...
reviews.comment: Got the right idea but definitely needs some work yet. Loads painfully slow. Could use a \"loading\" screen because upon first use it seems to be froze are not working at all. However, it seems to be the only app of it\'s kind though so it\'s either this or logging into your account online to change the settings. Definitely not disappointed though, it still gets the job done. Hopefully it will improve with some future updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all
reviews.comment: Black screen of death.  Liking the Locations app for Google Voice.  I would have given a zero but it would not submit my rating unless 1 or above.  Nice try, guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very long lag
reviews.comment: Overall app works but it does not work from the first launch. I force close it then relaunch it and it works after a 5-10 second lag. Droid Incredible MIUI
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No phones listed
reviews.comment: Wish this app worked for me. Logged in but no phones show up. Ice cream sandwich and two step google authorization. Requesting refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: simple get the job done well app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: v1.03: Completely killed app. Black screen only. Uninstall / reinstall / reboot does nadda. Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Everything has been fixed, this works well again
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Responsive dev but there are better alternatives
reviews.comment: The Developer was responsive when I reported a major Security Flaw.  Rather than pay $1 for this app, you might try Google Voice Locations by Techventus.  It includes the exact same features and so much more, it is free, and Open Source.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: \"Quick\" cuz it\'s extremely limited. Need to toggle phones assigned to groups! Add, remove phones. Forget proximity...how about the basics instead!
reviews.author: A Google User
